evergreen.description: Flag to designate u201ctimelessu201d articles, always topically relevant

pub_date.description: Earliest date article can be published (default sort)

update_date.description: Date the article was last updated

content_type.description: Type of content embodied by the article

export_phase.description: Phase of exporting that a business should be in to benefit from the article

industry.description: Industry category assigned to this article
